description: Notify the NMS that the DLDP detected one way. The hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex node is the interface index.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpUnidirectionalLink HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapIfName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapFaultReason s EXAMPLE

description: It describes the interface index of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex

description: It describes the interface name of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapIfName

description: It describes the reason interface fault.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapFaultReason

description: Notify the NMS that the DLDP detected that unidirectional link was resumed. The hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex node is interface index.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpLinkResume HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapIfName s EXAMPLE

description: It describes the interface index of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex

description: It describes the interface name of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapIfName

description: Notify the NMS that the DLDP detected Loop State. The hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex node is the interface index.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpLoopDetect HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapIfName s EXAMPLE

description: It describes the interface index of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex

description: It describes the interface name of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapIfName

description: Notify the NMS that the DLDP detected Loop State was resumed. The hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex node is interface index.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpLoopResume HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapIfName s EXAMPLE

description: It describes the interface index of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex

description: It describes the interface name of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB::hwDldpTrapIfName
